section.title: Search for Prospect
section.para: To search for a Prospect, select the "Search for Customer or Prospect" option. The following screen will appear:
When searching to retrieve Prospect information from the database, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter any character or combination of characters you want to match, followed by the TAB key. The "Search for" field supports pattern matching with Regular Expressions.

tip.para: Hitting the TAB key activates the search operation.

listitem.para: Specify which of the following criteria you want to include in the search:
Select to search by Prospect Number.
Select to search by Prospect Name.
Select to search by Primary Contact Name.
Select to search by Primary Contact Phone Number.
Select to search by Primary Contact Street Address.
Select to search by Primary Contact City.
Select to search by Primary Contact State.
Select to search by Primary Contact Postal Code.
Select to search by Primary Contact Country.
Select to show inactive Prospects as well as active Prospects. By default, inactive Prospects are not displayed.
